jd: From: Harika Vaka, Mavinsys harika.v@mavinsys.com Reply to: harika.v@mavinsys.com Java DeveloperLocation: Boston, MA (Needed only Locals- Mode of interview F2F only)Job Description:Onsite for 2 days/week in Boston is preferred Duration: 6-12 months (there is definitely more work than 6 months so if they do well, we can keep them on longer)Must be involved with all the investment applications such as portfolio management system, trading system, research system, across equity, fixed income and multi asset.Relevant experience of 7-10 years in senior level core Java, microservices, AWS, Kubernetes (EKS), SQL and looking for someone to be focused on execution – have 3 Architects who handle the design work.Understanding of Javascript/ Angular 8+ (this will be pretty much all backend/server-side dev though)Asset management industry experience. Primary skills: JMS Angular Java/J2EE side (Swings, Applets, EJB) REST API/REST Services Ant (Build tool)
